text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Having made a name for herself back<n>home, Oguri Cap
transfers to the<n>acclaimed Tracen Academy.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Word of her arrival travels quickly<n>between the trainers, and
they gather<n>around the campus training course to<n>watch
her in action.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Whew...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Thanks for running with me, Oguri<n>Cap. Pffft, hahaha!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Hm? Why are you laughing?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Ah, my apologies, I did not intend to<n>offend. It has been a
long while since<n>my time has been spent so<n>productively.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I've heard many a tall tale about your<n>amazing feats racing
in your regional<n>course, but I only now realize just<n>how
true they were.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
You are second to none, Oguri Cap. I<n>truly look forward to
competing with<n>you on the turf.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I see. Then how about a race next<n>time?

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Impressive. So that is the renowned<n>Oguri Cap. It's not
easy keeping up<n>with the Emperor herself—and with<n>such
a cool head too.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
And to so boldly challenge her to a<n>race. She must truly be
confident in<n>her abilities.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Well, I must get going. There's a<n>meet-up I need to attend.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Let's do this again sometime, Oguri<n>Cap.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: All right, then...

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
I wonder where she's headed?<n>Perhaps she's going
somewhere else<n>to train in secret.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Could that be the key to her agility? If<n>so, I most certainly
need to watch this<n>secret practice of hers.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Oh? Are you also interested in seeing<n>Oguri's training? Why
don't we all go<n>and watch her together?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Curious to figure out where Oguri Cap<n>was headed, I decide
to stick with the<n>other trainers and go after her.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Is she not going to start training?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
This is Oguri Cap we're talking about.<n>I'm sure there's
some meaning<n>behind her actions... or inaction, in this<n>
case.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Hmmm...

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text: She's back! But why?!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: What a peculiar girl...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Hmmmmmm...

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
What in the world is going on in that<n>head of hers? That's
the fourth time<n>she's circled around the same area...

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Is this girl really second to none? I<n>guess we'll have to
see... Let's come<n>back another day.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Bewildered by Oguri Cap's<n>perplexing conduct, the trainers<n>
slowly begin to take their leave.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Ummm...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Worried about Oguri Cap's strange<n>behavior, I walk over to
check on her.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I'm not sure. I keep walking and<n>walking, yet I end up at the
same<n>place.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Does this academy really have four<n>identical locations?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Lost, you say... Perhaps so.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Who are you, anyway? I've never<n>seen you around these
parts.
choice_data_list: I'm a trainer here at the Academy.
I'm a trainer here at the Academy.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: A trainer here... Could you show me<n>where to go?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I'm trying to get back to my dorm<n>room. I would appreciate
the<n>assistance.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I give the lost Oguri directions back to<n>her dorm.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: So that's where it is. Got it. Thanks<n>for your help. See ya.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A few minutes after seeing off Oguri<n>Cap, she reappears
from a different<n>direction.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Huh?! I just saw a trainer who looks<n>exactly like you! Are
you some kinda<n>doppelganger?
choice_data_list: You're just back where you started!
You're just back where you started!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
...So it appears. Now that you mention<n>it, everything else is
the same too.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
It's a challenge telling what's what in<n>the city. The buildings
are all so close<n>together, not to mention they look the<n>
same. Things were much simpler<n>back home.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I knew my way around town. Turn<n>right at Tome's field, and
you could<n>clearly see my school. The bus stop<n>was to the
left of Shige's large<n>warehouse. So easy.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Whenever I passed by, Tome would<n>give me some
mandarins to munch on.<n>They were the absolute sweetest.<n>
Really takes me back...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Sometimes, I guess. But I can't go<n>back just yet.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Tome, Shige, Chiyo, and Yoshi... They<n>all helped me get to
central—to race<n>with the best.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Everyone back home is cheering me<n>on.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I cannot—will not—let them down.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Oguri Cap gazes on, finishing her little<n>speech with a fierce
yet forlorn<n>expression across her face.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Hm... It's about time I head back. The<n>dorm was this way,
right? I'm sure<n>it's this way...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Concerned that Oguri Cap would<n>spend the rest of the night
endlessly<n>wandering about the campus, I<n>accompanied
her back to her dorm<n>entrance.
